Pierre felt uncomfortable and even depressed in his friend's company and at last became si- lent. 
"I'll tell you what, my dear fellow," said Prince Andrew, who evidently also felt de- pressed and constrained with his visitor, "I am only bivouacking here and have just come to look round. I am going back to my sister today. I will introduce you to her. But of course you know her already," he said, evidently trying to entertain a visitor with whom he now fou
